title: Governance for better futures - insights from conversation #1: 'Meta-governance'
body:
**For many people, governance is an obscure concept. For those engaged in it, it often relates to organisational performance and oversight of compliance, culture, strategy, and risk. Prevailing models tend to concentrate control and reinforce power structures. Less often is governance designed to be generative, distributed, and enabling of self-organisation.**

Given governance is, in essence, how authority and accountability is held and actioned in any given context, we think this core social infrastructure is ripe for innovation. Fortunately, the arrival of web3, coinciding with other pressures and shifts in the world, are inviting us to reframe, revitalise, and, in many respects, remember, what governance is and can be.

With this in mind, [SuperBenefit DAO](https://www.superbenefit.org/) is convening a [series of conversations](https://superbenefit.mirror.xyz/Bcsl19CZ67amLJY_bee5dUy0DEboZykuMQqw58wGlGI) to explore how the nature of governance is evolving and its role in accelerating transitions to better futures. We’re specifically interested in how web3 technologies are enabling new thinking and their potential to combine with existing practices, perspectives, and traditional wisdom.

The first conversation we hosted was on ‘meta-governance’. We gathered with a small group of founders and DAO-ers to discuss what it is and where it could take us.

## The contributors

* [Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes) – Co-founder [@TeamSobol](https://twitter.com/TeamSobol) | Also playing the DAO game w/ [@banklessDAO](https://twitter.com/banklessDAO), [@CityDAO](https://twitter.com/CityDAO), [@DAOPunksNFT](https://twitter.com/DAOPunksNFT), [@PolygonDAO](https://twitter.com/PolygonDAO), [@ReputableDAO](https://twitter.com/ReputableDAO) in my spare cycles.
* [Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth) – On-chain sleuth: [@InfoTokenDAO](https://twitter.com/InfoTokenDAO)
* [justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr) – Head of dao strategy, bd, & metagovernance at [@rabbithole_gg](https://twitter.com/rabbithole_gg) - [justine.mirror.xyz](https://t.co/8jcuIPBPEj)
* [Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro) – Centerless network gravity | [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO), [@AkinaFoundation](https://twitter.com/AkinaFoundation) – [socialleancanvas.com](https://t.co/JNON2dLI2L)
* Moderated by: [@ml_baldwin](https://twitter.com/ml_baldwin) and [@HeenalR](https://twitter.com/HeenalR)

## The discussion

The text below is an attempt to capture the key points and themes from the discussion. We have attributed specific points of emphasis, but our summary doesn't do justice to either the depth of conversation or the insights provided by the contributors. As a result, we encourage you to [listen to a recording of the session](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1rmGPgQyzOjKN).

### What is meta-governance?

There are different ways to unpack the ‘meta’ in meta-governance. A narrow definition, specific to web3, refers to the nature of governance created by index mechanisms that acquire tokens from various DAOs and protocols. With these tokens come governance interests and rights. This framing can be generalised to refer to how DAOs participate in, and influence, each other.

A broader conception of meta-governance relates to *‘how we figure out whole systems governance’* *([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))* and deal with issues that impact everyone but can’t be controlled by any specific individual or entity. While this is salient in web3 in relation to core integrity issues (such as mitigating the impact of Sybil attacks), it also transcends the digital context. Indeed, systems governance (and inter-systems governance) will be critical in how we respond to challenges, such as climate change, and how we evolve the communities and societies we live within.

This more expansive framing of meta-governance also creates space to transcend current constructs of governance and speculate about where emerging trends are taking us and what could be possible.

### ‘What is ‘beyond governance’...?

Like the hard structures of boards and ballots in conventional contexts, much web3 governance gets reduced to token-weighted mechanisms. The emphasis rests on the act of governance - voting on proposals; rather than the process of governance - deliberation and wayfinding. And despite the intent to distribute and decentralise, token-based voting often slips into old patterns of concentrating power and influence.

If governance is to become more attuned and responsive to the systems dynamics it exists within, how do we find ways to ‘soften’ the flows of influence and authority? How might we match technicalities with the emergent energies produced within movements and networks? How can we harness social capital to sense and shape systems change? How might governance forums be more responsive to stakeholder sentiment and bottom-up interests?

Could we design governance systems to enable smaller and localised groups to express their interests and consent into *‘roll-ups’ ([Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes))*. Could forums become more flexible to include representatives and specialised perspectives based on specific issues and context? We need to experiment more with bottom-up and localised decision making, and enable more people to engage on issues that are relevant to them - enabling them to come together as and when it makes sense to cooperate *([Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro))*.

On this point, we also have to do a better job of communicating that *‘governance has teeth’ ([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))* and that it's worth participating in. To do this, we need to better understand the roots of apathy (which may be an echo of the disenfranchisement experienced in conventional contexts) and be able to demonstrate that voice can have influence. Critically, *‘participation in governance requires education’* *([justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr))* for governance. We’re reminded that when [Mondragon](https://www.mondragon-corporation.com/en/) has acquired conventional businesses and converted them into cooperatives, that they take five years to enable employees to transition their mindsets and behaviours into those of active co-owners.

### How can Web3 contribute to better futures?

Many of the meta challenges faced by humanity today are the product of *‘doing a bad job of dealing with complexity’ ([Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes))*. Artificial separation and simplification of sectors, entities, and interests has spilled over into any number of negative externalities and is leading to runaway consequences. Looking ahead, we need *‘systems of systems’* finding ways to interact and do better for people and the planet. Within this, we need to reframe governance as the stewardship of holistic interests rather than just specific ones.

Traditional governance in existing institutions will struggle to provide this reform, but the infrastructures provided by Web3 technologies, enabled by the cultural levers of *‘self-sovereignty (ED: this concept has different connotations - we lean towards ideas of self-determination vs. narrow property rights) and bottom-up influence’*, offer the potential of *‘liquid democracies’* and genuine power shifts.

This is further aided by the incentives inherent in Web3. Rather than zero-sum scaling dynamics found in conventional (and Web2) commerce, Web3 ecosystems scale through mutual growth and success. In thinking about how we intentionally shape the direction and evolution of these ecosystems, it’s helpful to ask *‘how we might go about influencing the direction of an industry?’* (e.g. ‘Defi’) *([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))*. Might we use strategies like cross-DAO token holding to build coalitions of projects aligned around particular values and ethics?

These simple token swaps are dynamic and are creating some interesting results. They’re a means to weave interconnections and interdependencies, and for small parties to move together and raft their power - ‘*Token swaps are a swapping and sharing of power’ ([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))*. We see amazing examples of trust and energy emerging from small, disparate groups organising in web3. It would seem that web3 is providing spaces for new value sets and norms to take hold, and becoming an attractor for people who seek radical but practical reform to find each other and act.

Importantly for a change agenda, the inherent properties of DAOs are attuned to *[‘Autonomy, complexity, emergence, agency, and transparency’](https://justine.mirror.xyz/ITRTe2OKz4BALnDe9vMhzGfrSCS16G-nu6mOaIoNx_o)* *([justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr))* This affinity with complexity makes web3 and DAOs powerful infrastructures for the governance of systems and physical spaces. This can relate to evolving notions of ‘[commoning](https://books.google.com.au/books/about/Sacred_Civics.html?id=VA7UzgEACAAJ&redir_esc=y)’ - where actors take shared responsibility for stewarding assets and places for future generations. This can be seen in emerging experiments such as [City DAO](https://www.citydao.io/) where there is a blurring of the metaverse and physical spaces to foster networked cities. To enable self-organising models to be responsive to their contexts, we need to *‘design for complexity in mind - minimum parameters in place but not too rigid - try to keep it simple’ ([justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr)).*

### Wrapping up

The *‘meme of decentralisation’* often presents as something outside of us - as an inherent quality of the Web3 environment, but *‘it needs to be insisted upon and actively established’ ([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))*. Individuals acting across forums, networks, and protocols can curate experiences and spheres of engagement that promote this ethos and the emergence of values-based meta-governance.

We all have a responsibility to do this. Indeed, while increasing sensitivity to sentiment is important, transitions to better futures will demand greater pro-activity in shaping the values and norms of core industries and systems. Doing this well in Web3 will provide opportunities to harness digital infrastructures in physical contexts, and provide powerful tools to address some of our world's most urgent challenges.

### Coming up…

If this caught your interest, join us for the next conversations. On June 16, 6.30-7.30 PM (EST), the conversation will explore: *‘DAO to DAO - what are we seeing and learning from inter-DAO cooperation?’*. On June 30, 6.30-7.30 PM (EST), the conversation will turn to: *‘New and old - what can Web3 learn from and contribute to existing governance perspectives and practices?’*. [Set a Twitter reminder here](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1PlJQaVzbNaJE).

Some other governance discovery being undertaken by @SuperBenefitDAO:

* [DAOs aren't things... they are flows.](https://superbenefit.mirror.xyz/3-ESNDLcf44dZ6VteaqZSpQuTL0oouSxlLJwuAlcQ_s)

title: Governance for better futures - insights from conversation #1: 'Meta-governance'
body:
**For many people, governance is an obscure concept. For those engaged in it, it often relates to organisational performance and oversight of compliance, culture, strategy, and risk. Prevailing models tend to concentrate control and reinforce power structures. Less often is governance designed to be generative, distributed, and enabling of self-organisation.**

Given governance is, in essence, how authority and accountability is held and actioned in any given context, we think this core social infrastructure is ripe for innovation. Fortunately, the arrival of web3, coinciding with other pressures and shifts in the world, are inviting us to reframe, revitalise, and, in many respects, remember, what governance is and can be.

With this in mind, [SuperBenefit DAO](https://www.superbenefit.org/) is convening a [series of conversations](https://superbenefit.mirror.xyz/Bcsl19CZ67amLJY_bee5dUy0DEboZykuMQqw58wGlGI) to explore how the nature of governance is evolving and its role in accelerating transitions to better futures. We’re specifically interested in how web3 technologies are enabling new thinking and their potential to combine with existing practices, perspectives, and traditional wisdom.

The first conversation we hosted was on ‘meta-governance’. We gathered with a small group of founders and DAO-ers to discuss what it is and where it could take us.

## The contributors

* [Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes) – Co-founder [@TeamSobol](https://twitter.com/TeamSobol) | Also playing the DAO game w/ [@banklessDAO](https://twitter.com/banklessDAO), [@CityDAO](https://twitter.com/CityDAO), [@DAOPunksNFT](https://twitter.com/DAOPunksNFT), [@PolygonDAO](https://twitter.com/PolygonDAO), [@ReputableDAO](https://twitter.com/ReputableDAO) in my spare cycles.
* [Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth) – On-chain sleuth: [@InfoTokenDAO](https://twitter.com/InfoTokenDAO)
* [justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr) – Head of dao strategy, bd, & metagovernance at [@rabbithole_gg](https://twitter.com/rabbithole_gg) - [justine.mirror.xyz](https://t.co/8jcuIPBPEj)
* [Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro) – Centerless network gravity | [@SuperBenefitDAO](https://twitter.com/SuperBenefitDAO), [@AkinaFoundation](https://twitter.com/AkinaFoundation) – [socialleancanvas.com](https://t.co/JNON2dLI2L)
* Moderated by: [@ml_baldwin](https://twitter.com/ml_baldwin) and [@HeenalR](https://twitter.com/HeenalR)

## The discussion

The text below is an attempt to capture the key points and themes from the discussion. We have attributed specific points of emphasis, but our summary doesn't do justice to either the depth of conversation or the insights provided by the contributors. As a result, we encourage you to [listen to a recording of the session](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1rmGPgQyzOjKN).

### What is meta-governance?

There are different ways to unpack the ‘meta’ in meta-governance. A narrow definition, specific to web3, refers to the nature of governance created by index mechanisms that acquire tokens from various DAOs and protocols. With these tokens come governance interests and rights. This framing can be generalised to refer to how DAOs participate in, and influence, each other.

A broader conception of meta-governance relates to *‘how we figure out whole systems governance’* *([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))* and deal with issues that impact everyone but can’t be controlled by any specific individual or entity. While this is salient in web3 in relation to core integrity issues (such as mitigating the impact of Sybil attacks), it also transcends the digital context. Indeed, systems governance (and inter-systems governance) will be critical in how we respond to challenges, such as climate change, and how we evolve the communities and societies we live within.

This more expansive framing of meta-governance also creates space to transcend current constructs of governance and speculate about where emerging trends are taking us and what could be possible.

### ‘What is ‘beyond governance’...?

Like the hard structures of boards and ballots in conventional contexts, much web3 governance gets reduced to token-weighted mechanisms. The emphasis rests on the act of governance - voting on proposals; rather than the process of governance - deliberation and wayfinding. And despite the intent to distribute and decentralise, token-based voting often slips into old patterns of concentrating power and influence.

If governance is to become more attuned and responsive to the systems dynamics it exists within, how do we find ways to ‘soften’ the flows of influence and authority? How might we match technicalities with the emergent energies produced within movements and networks? How can we harness social capital to sense and shape systems change? How might governance forums be more responsive to stakeholder sentiment and bottom-up interests?

Could we design governance systems to enable smaller and localised groups to express their interests and consent into *‘roll-ups’ ([Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes))*. Could forums become more flexible to include representatives and specialised perspectives based on specific issues and context? We need to experiment more with bottom-up and localised decision making, and enable more people to engage on issues that are relevant to them - enabling them to come together as and when it makes sense to cooperate *([Rowan Yeoman](https://twitter.com/yeoro))*.

On this point, we also have to do a better job of communicating that *‘governance has teeth’ ([Gabagool.Ξth](https://twitter.com/gabagooldoteth))* and that it's worth participating in. To do this, we need to better understand the roots of apathy (which may be an echo of the disenfranchisement experienced in conventional contexts) and be able to demonstrate that voice can have influence. Critically, *‘participation in governance requires education’* *([justinehy.eth](https://twitter.com/lalalavendr))* for governance. We’re reminded that when [Mondragon](https://www.mondragon-corporation.com/en/) has acquired conventional businesses and converted them into cooperatives, that they take five years to enable employees to transition their mindsets and behaviours into those of active co-owners.

### How can Web3 contribute to better futures?

Many of the meta challenges faced by humanity today are the product of *‘doing a bad job of dealing with complexity’ ([Bryan Petes](https://twitter.com/BryanPetes))*. Artificial separation and simplification of sectors, entities, and interests has spilled over into any number of negative externalities and is leading to runaway consequences. Looking ahead, we need *‘systems of systems’* finding ways to interact and do better for people and the planet. title: NFT 从入门到"放弃"
body:
**背景**

从opensea 月交易量看NFT市场，去年7月NFT开始火爆，今年1月份达到交易量峰值。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-762fcf683bfc1af7ed73c7d00ca3250c_b.jpg)

opensea 月交易量

明星和潮牌IP纷纷以NFT，元宇宙概念进行一波宣传营销，让加密货币更加出圈。

最近半月花了点时间学习，才有了对NFT几点看法， 不知正确与否， 发出来分享下。

**NFT一级市场**

参与NFT一级市场，相当于币圈token打新，通常需要做任务才能拿到白名单资格， 有了白名单资格，才有资格花费EHT去mint NFT（通常0.05-0.2EHT不等,具体以项目方定价标准，还不包含gas 费。）

做任务获取NFT白名单， 通常关注推特， 转发推文， 加入电报， 加入discord ,在discord保持一定聊天活跃等级， 解答群友问题， 邀请人数等，项目方从这些做完任务的人里面挑选一些人给予白名单资格， 也就是说你做完任务给不给白名单还很大的不确定性。

白名单的获取途径二， 项目方还会和多个NFT领域的KOL合作，比如给10个白名单到KoL社群， KOL在其频道或者社区 做这个NFT的宣传，给项目方导流。

白名单的获取途径三， 你已经持有某个知名NFT ，目前你要参加的NFT项目， 可能免费给这个知名NFT项目持有者白名单资格。

白名单的发放， 可能分批次进行，第一批白名单没有你， 继续肝任务，争取第二批白名单。。。

获得一个白名单资格，大部分项目规定允许最多mint2个NFT ，再多不行了， 具体还是看规定。

[minty](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//mintyscore.com/rankings/projects%3Ftype%3Dupcoming%26sort%3Dminty_score%26order%3Ddesc%26chain%3Dall%26name%3D)这个网站可以看正在进行白名单或者mint的项目，项目有很多， 同时要花很多时间去筛选项目，然后再去做任务。

这么火爆， 参与就能赚钱吗？

正常来说， 参与一级市场，亏钱的风险应该是比二级市场小的， 很多参与进来的人，拼命肝白名单，也是为了低价获取一个NFT，二级市场高价抛售套利。

我参与的感受是，

1.项目太多了 ， 鱼龙混杂，也担心跑路和破发， 还不太像token打新， 有一个打新平台背书和筛选。NFT项目大部分在自己的官网mint ，没有平台审核和背书。

2.白名单任务太肝，是否有白名单资格还是很多不确定性， 不应是我肝完，就可以有白名单了。

3.如果我获得白名单， 最多只能mint2 个， 假设我用0.1ETH/个的成本mint， 二级市场涨了5倍，两个NFT0.2ETH 成本， 卖掉赚0.8 EHT。 说少不少，说多不多。我是没啥资金体量的玩家， 赚0.8EHT，我就太开心了，跟抽奖中奖的感觉。假如我是有资金的玩家参与， 花了很多时间，找了很多项目，肝了很多任务，只能mint2个NFT ，有资金也没办法大搞， 赚0.8ETH,投入产出比太低了。

**NFT二级市场**

以无聊猴蓝筹NFT项目作为交易标的，从交易量和涨跌幅两个方面看，

无聊猴的地板价图示， 1月31号地板价120EHT,今天83EHT , 涨跌幅挺大吧 ？

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d410ff39e51f49e7823df8a19cca7baa_b.jpg)

无聊猴地板价

再比如cryptopunks，杰伦熊，cool cat ,adidas 等几个市值和交易量排名靠前蓝筹NFT的地板价和交易量，大家可以去查一下，其特点是交易量不算大， 涨跌幅不算小，流动性挺一般。

蓝筹是这样，不是蓝筹的NFT交易量就更小， 涨跌幅更大， 流行性更差。

像极非常早期的加密货币市场，不大的资金出货，可能砸出一个大坑，可能砸在手里，变成挂盘侠。用炒token的思维理解就是深度不行，基于以上特点， 我们目前可能还不能像炒token一样炒NFT获利。

**如何对待NFT板块**

一级市场很肝，二级市场还不够成熟足以作为交易标的，也不能像玩defi 一样大搞。

*1从获利的角度：* 以撸空投的态度参与NFT白名单， 既保持NFT板块发展和热点的关注，也不至于投入太多时间精力甚至金钱，而颗粒无收。

2从NFT的特殊赋能和兴趣爱好收藏角度：

比如在币安售卖的polkastarter平台的NFT，可以参与平台所有项目打新，而且保证有额度，作为打新一族，价格合适，也会考虑，可惜太贵了，哈哈哈。

又比如adidas 的NFT ,赋能可以换实物的衣帽，如果地板价到心里的价位，搞一个也行，自己觉得买不了吃亏，买不了上当。

也有大佬，80EHT不算什么， 买个无聊猴，加入富人club ，就和消费一辆跑车一样， 此时NFT成为通往认识跨界大佬们的门票。

**NFT 工具和资讯门户：**

**NFT Marketplace：**[https://opensea.io/](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//opensea.io/)

**Data & Analysis：**[https://dune.xyz/home](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//dune.xyz/home)

**NFT Rarity：**[https://raritysniper.com/](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//raritysniper.com/)

地板价监测预警网站：[sunpot](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//sunspot.gg/alerts)

其功能是设置好关注的项目，当有人挂上价格到达你监测的价格，就会发消息到你推特或者discord，你就不用一直上行情网站去查心仪NFT 的价格了。

title: WaTell's NFT Research：14.Chief Toad
body:
🎈 **Hello my friends**

**This is Watell.**

**The project to be shared in the 14th issue** **of "WaTell's NFT Research" is: Chief Toad.**

**🎪 Project Twitter:**

**Chief Toad** [@ChiefToadNFT](https://twitter.com/ChiefToadNFT)

[https://twitter.com/ChiefToadNFT](https://twitter.com/ChiefToadNFT)

**🎊 Amount of NFTs: The exact amount has not yet been decided**

**🎊MINT Date: Late June**

**🎊MINT price: 0.1 ETH (public sale); 0.08 ETH (white list)**

**🎊Number of followers on official Twitter: 120 K**

**🎊Number of Discords: 21.6 K**

**🎃Project introduction:**

**Chief Toad** is a 2D PFP-like NFT project that exists on the Ethereum chain. In addition to the decorative function of PFP itself, **Chief Toad** is also a PASS card for the **"G-link"** platform. By holding **Chief Toad's NFT**, players can enjoy all the exclusive privileges the **G-link platform** has to offer.

So what is **"G-link"**?

**G-Link** is a complete game ecosystem, including blockchain games modeled on **'Play to Earn'** , NFT marketplaces, game token exchanges and game incubators that serve investors, developers, marketers and gamers Provides a platform for communication and learning to help them progress together in the industry. **G-LINK** uses the **$GLINK** token supported by both ETH and BSc chains for basic governance. Players can stake **$GLINK** tokens **(APR around 4%)** to earn money, or buy premium items in the game.

**G-Link** combines internal development and outsourcing studios for game development. In addition to basic game developers, the project party also plans to use a blockchain game incubator as part of the **G-Link** platform. The incubator will help small game developers turn their dream projects into reality, and funding details are mentioned in **G-Link**'s white paper (see question 9). **G-Link** currently has 4 games in development, and **G-Link**'s progress in game development is fully transparent and viewable by users.

![G-Link](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O_A5qIQd3xYpwBo57Wgua.png?height=876&width=1733)

In addition to the identity of the game platform, **G-Link** also plans to create an **NFT trading market**. **G-Link** NFT Market is a comprehensive cross-chain marketplace that will be used to mint, sell and collect game NFTs on ETH and BSC chains. Since there are few gaming NFT marketplaces on the market, the goal of **the G-Link NFT marketplace** is to seamlessly bridge **Web 2.0** and **Web 3.0** by introducing NFTs to gamers in an accessible way. For more information about **G-Link**, you can find the answer in [the official white paper](https://glink.games/wp-content/uploads/GLink-Whitepaper-Designed-v23.03.22-1.pdf).

**🎨 Art style introduction:**

I believe that most of my friends will think of a classic comic when they see **Chief Toad**: **"Naruto"** 😂. In Miaomu Mountain in the comics, there are toad immortals and a group of psychic ninjas, the most classic of which is the "gang boss" **Toad Wen Tai**. The project team also stated very frankly that "our inspiration comes from Naruto. In Naruto, Miaomushan Toad helps the protagonist become mature and smart. Similarly, we regard Chief Toad NFT as leading Web 2.0 into Web 3.0. , and help the bearer to transform into a 'Hokage' 😂."

The art and design style of **Chief Toad** is very different from most NFT projects on the market today. **Chief Toad**'s artistic concept is inspired by many allusions in East Asian culture and history. At the same time, the artistic style references traditional art movements such as Japanese woodblock print Ukiyo-e and Chinese ink painting.

In addition to the tricky art design itself, **Chief Toad** has also put a lot of effort into the design of Traits. You can see the shadows of many famous comics in the preview images below, such as "Demon Slayer", "Dragon Ball" , "One Piece" and so on. I believe that how to make the toad itself, an animal that is not very 'beautiful', to the greatest extent pleasing to the eye must have spent a lot of time on the project side 😆.

![Chief Toad NFT Preview](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WD4FwoaHGGQpePsIfmJy_.jpg?height=4027&width=4032)

🎏 **Summary:**

As a PASS NFT project, **Chief Toad** not only has rich resource reserves, but also has strong artistic characteristics. Currently, the Discord community only needs to chat and upgrade to get the whitelist. If you are interested in this type of ink painting style NFT, you are welcome to enter their [Discord](https://discord.gg/kQGMR8qrXn) for more details.

Your Source of Reliable, Unbiased Research and Due Diligence

# Basic Information

Enjoy your home on the internet,Chillchat is the place where people go to chill, chat, create and earn.

### Introduction

Chillchat is a create-to-earn pixel art NFT metaverse, a vast collection of virtual worlds, made entirely by its players, where you can jump into adventure with a new identity created by you or another player, pixel by pixel.

### Gameplay

All gameplay in Chillchat will hinge around $CHILL - players will be encouraged to purchase more $CHILL to continue creating new NFTs they can trade with others.

### 1. Bring your art to life

The pixel art editor gives you all the tools to bring your art to life. After drawing and then animating your own characters, you can become them, trade them with friends within Chillchat, or sell them on secondary markets to give new buyers access to Chillchat.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cmT2Bk-UuCH20Qp8Bzp2C.png?height=269&width=512)

### 2. Easy to build worlds.

Create your own worlds to chill with friends, and eventually fully-fledged game levels with enemy NPCs, items, bosses, and more. Tiles make it easy to replicate pixel art assets you create throughout your worlds.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k8plX9EBEGw4yhwSkTTov.png?height=505&width=512)

### 3.Compile the next big game titles in minutes

Ever wanted to create your own pixel art RPG game? What about your own dungeon, bar, or arcade with the ability to monetize your creations.  

You can even engineer your own game! Turn your World into a game with World Engine, easy-to-use visual node scripting or a powerful C++ editor.

### 4.A place for yours and your friends' stories.

Jump into Chillchat any time or place with friends, on your computers or mobile app, and experience never ending adventures and stories.

### 5.Find the perfect trade. 

With our advanced trading features, you can seamlessly trade with other players, trade your Chillchat NFTs in seconds and get back to exploring for the next perfect trade.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SYQQA_iPvCIoBd6H5nmgP.png?height=287&width=512)

# Tokenomics

Till this moment, there are no publicly officially generated tokens to the crypto market. But $CHILL is on its way.

**$CHILL** 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RaGP4vjPDqMJBtc-ysosd.png?height=489&width=913)

$CHILL is the only token generated by Chillchat Origins, as well as offered as a reward in Staking. $CHILL will be offered to the public at a future date.(2022/6/10),which means information about TGE and IDO/IEO is still unknown.

### Utility

* Create your own NFTs in Chillchat to trade
* Buy Worlds
* Get one whitelist spot to buy your first World at a flat price

### Allocation

Origin holders will receive a daily reward of 50 $CHILL by logging on every day and finding the Chill Cat running around Chill World. Daily Origin rewards have been allocated 10% of the $CHILL supply, at a total of 150,000,000 to account for the first 5 years.

So far, the release date, IDO, information about private mint events and sale price still remains unknown. But other allocative information is as follows:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/a-CtWd475HK9XfwjH6OR-.png?height=502&width=900)

# NFT Introduction

### Origin

All new creations in Chillchat stem from Origins. The first generation of characters can be purchased from official weekly auctions, or from listings on secondary markets.  

### Utility

* Mint Gen 2 Origins
* Receive daily $CHILL tokens
* Access to exclusive Origin communities
* One free Chillchat World

### Brief information 

1500 unique Origin characters are being released to proof market acceptance and to build a loyal,passionate user base.1000 of them will be minted via private and public mint for 2 SOL($78.55),and 400 of the rest will be minted via public auction starting at 2 SOL($78.55).

These early owners of the Origin are the evangelists and will help build Chillchat into a vibrant community.

You can purchase them off secondaries or during the auctions on Magic Eden or on other secondaries. \[Date TBA\](2022/6/9)

### Marketing Performance

In total, there are 1.2k Chillchat NFTs now sold in Magic Eden. Currently 653 owners have at least one Chillchat NTF in their wallet with a total trading volume of 44815.04 SOL (Around $1760037.15).

The first NFT was minted on January 20th, 2022 at a price of 42.5 SOL (Around $1669.12). In the last 30 days, the highest sales were over 70 SOL ($2749.14).

Compared to the beginning,the mint price was 2 SOL($83.17) while the floor price now is 36 SOL($1413.84)(2022/6/9).

That is to say that prices are rising fast day by day,which means the  sooner you invest, the sooner you'll get an abundant return.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R3RqwHaclWzhy3NG66anY.png?height=321&width=927)

There NFTs are sold out at a section between 20 SOL($802.40) to 40 SOL($1604.81) on each auction, and the data of daily transactions is as follows:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xElbVw7KcZS_oBPQ6mtfh.png?height=487&width=907)

Considering the project is still in its early stages, investors are enthusiastic and optimistic about the project. Over half of the NFTs have their owners, and each investor possesses almost 2 NFTs as an average.

## Community

Currently, Twitter and Discord are two major communities for Chillchat players. Since it was a relatively span-new project, there are only 23.3k Twitter followers and 23.4k discord members. However, it has giant potential to invest because of the high activity in discord for the daily messages between players are over 100, and the mod will always be there for your problems within several minutes. 

By analyzing their followers’ structure, there are 89 NFT whales followed.

Players’ enthusiasm and loyalty are also worth mentioning. Almost each kind of NFT will be sold out at each auction.

# Investors ＆Founders

title: 連阿嬤都能輕易上手的鏈遊-Stepn
body:
你有聽過跑步可以賺錢嗎？沒錯，Stepn讓它成真了。曾何幾時，跑步賺的錢已經超過一般在超商、外送人員的薪水。這種新的 X to Earn的模式，也讓人們發現在Web3.0時代，萬勿皆可以變現。

> 近半年來，Stepn是Web3.0最受關注的GameFi之一，跑步賺錢的模式讓人相擁而入。玩家需要透過買跑鞋NFT，透過跑步得到遊戲代幣，最後可以換成美金穩定幣提領。

本篇不討論遊戲經濟，或是如何靠遊戲賺錢，而是以使用者角度切入，為何Stepn可以帶入幣圈跟非幣圈的玩家入場。

`(1)App介面` 簡潔的App見面，讓即使不懂英文的玩家，也可以直覺遊玩。Home頁面，只有一個Start開始鍵，讓玩家只要按下就可以開始跑步。

![Stepn App介面](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1m76kYgmm2iYW4fnJ90lq.png?height=656&width=1222)

`(2)錢包`
這是最令人驚艷的地方，大部分項目都要外部個人錢包連接遊戲，而Stepn做到了把錢包嵌在遊戲App裡面，大大減少入門的門檻。玩家可以輕易地在App裡面創建個人錢包(如圖中Wallet)，可以跟遊戲內錢包的互相轉帳。另外，外部個人錢包還可以做到各種幣別的換匯，玩家可以很容易地把遊戲幣換回美金穩定幣(如圖中Swap)。

`(3)NFT交易市場`
玩過NFT的玩家都知道，要去如Opensea二級市場做買賣，但是Stepn聰明的把市場(如圖中Marketplace)留在App裏面，光是手續費，就賺到了大部分收入。

總結來說，Stepn是目前GameFi中最平易近人的鏈遊，它吸引了許多非幣圈的玩家，這點是非常難人可貴的。

title: How to run node Massa version 11.3
body:
Massa is a truly decentralized blockchain controlled by thousands of people. With the breakthrough multithreaded technology, we’re set for mass adoption.

> **Trước khi bắt đầu thực hiện các lệnh sau:**

Tạo màn hình screen riêng (nếu đã tạo rồi thì bỏ qua bước này)

***B1: Cài đặt thư viện screen***

```
sudo apt-get update 
```

```
sudo apt-get install screen
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2GjGzYlxJ7c_WcjP_kjGF.png?height=101&width=590)

Ấn Y

***B2: Tạo screen:*** `screen -S  Massa`

Để thoát cái session đó anh em nhấn tổ hợp phím ctrl +A +D

Để vào lại session đó thì anh em thực hiện như sau

1/ List danh sách screen session đang dc mở : `screen -ls`

2/ Mở lại screen session: `screen -R [tên screen dc list trên bước 1]`

> **I. Step by step run node Massa with linux OS:**

* **Update thư viện**

  > ```
  > sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
  > ```
  >
  > ```
  > sudo apt install wget jq git build-essential pkg-config libssl-dev -y
  > ```
* **Tải xuống và giải nén các tệp**

  ```
  massa_version=`wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/massalabs/massa/releases/latest | jq -r ".tag_name"`; \
  wget -qO $HOME/massa.tar.gz "https://github.com/massalabs/massa/releases/download/${massa_version}/massa_${massa_version}_release_linux.tar.gz"; \
  tar -xvf $HOME/massa.tar.gz; \
  rm -rf $HOME/massa.tar.gz
  ```
* **Thực thi các tệp:**

  > ```
  > chmod +x $HOME/massa/massa-node/massa-node \
  > $HOME/massa/massa-client/massa-client
  > ```
* **Thêm các lệnh vào hệ thống dưới dạng các biến:**

  > ```
  > . <(wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SecorD0/Massa/main/insert_variables.sh)
  > ```
* **Khởi chạy node**

  **Thay đổi các nút khởi động trong cấu hình:**

  > ```
  > . <(wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SecorD0/Massa/main/multi_tool.sh) \
  > -rb
  > ```

  **Tạo tệp dịch vụ:**

  > ```
  > printf "[Unit]
  > Description=Massa Node
  > After=network-online.target
  > 
  > [Service]
  > User=$USER
  > WorkingDirectory=$HOME/massa/massa-node
  > ExecStart=$HOME/massa/massa-node/massa-node
  > Restart=on-failure
  > RestartSec=3
  > LimitNOFILE=65535
  > 
  > [Install]
  > WantedBy=multi-user.target" > /etc/systemd/system/massad.service
  > ```

  **Chạy tệp dịch vụ:**

  ```
  sudo systemctl daemon-reload 
  sudo systemctl enable massad 
  sudo systemctl restart massad
  ```
* Chờ dòng chữ xuất hiện`Successful bootstrap `

  **Thực hiện check log:**

  `massa_log`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SEXVnwBHCIAg3g9pFkljx.png?height=235&width=1106)

**II. Tạo ví:**

* **Khởi chạy ứng dụng khách**

  `massa_client`
* **Tạo ví mới**

  `wallet_generate_private_key`
* **Lấy thông tin ví:**

  `wallet_info`

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/D0soxscrq71S_88lhuuXx.png?height=395&width=614)

* **Copy Address post vào mục #⌠💸⌡testnet-faucet [discord dự án](https://discord.gg/massa) để xin token:**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YXwNi8Ok_q7Wa3mSJ6FhN.png?height=884&width=1587)

* **Quay lại server gõ lệnh check ví:**

  ```
  massa_wallet_info
  ```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/z0JP54tjAitYr6WU2L7DH.png?height=172&width=635)

Hoặc có thể check xem nhận dc Massa token thông qua [website](https://massa.net/testnet/wallet) dự án bằng cách nhập lại info ví đã copy ở mục ***wallet_info***

Nếu mã thông báo được yêu cầu nhầm đến địa chỉ sai, thì bạn có thể sửa lỗi trong các kênh **#general** , **#testnet** hoặc thông qua tin nhắn riêng với quản trị viên.

Nếu `massa_wallet_info`số dư bằng 0 được hiển thị khi lệnh được gọi, nhưng có mã thông báo trong ví web sử dụng khóa cá nhân, thì bạn cần khởi động lại nút bằng lệnh:

```
sudo systemctl restart massad
```

**III. Staking:**

Để tham gia vào mạng lưới thử nghiệm, bạn cần mua ít nhất 1 ROLL và đặt cọc. Tỷ giá hối đoái: 1 ROLL = 100 MAS.

* **Mua ROLLs cho toàn bộ số dư:**

  ```
  massa_buy_rolls -mb
  ```

  Cần đợi 0,5-10 phút và kiểm tra xem các ROLL mà đội mua đã xuất hiện chưa
* **Check xem Roll đã được mua chưa:**

  ```
  massa_wallet_info
  ```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/V6iSgjOPX_HvkkTJgj2hT.png?height=155&width=711)

* **Tiếp theo, bạn cần kích hoạt tính năng đặt cược cho ví bằng lệnh:**

  ```
  massa_cli_client -a node_add_staking_private_keys
  ```

  Sau khi đăng ký khóa đặt cược, bạn cần đợi khoảng 1 giờ 40 phút để ROLL hoạt động.

  Sau đó, sau một thời gian, mã thông báo để đặt cược sẽ bắt đầu tích lũy - 1 MAS được trao cho mỗi khối được xử lý.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5TcQ0RlcNvjjzmeMKXw4p.png?height=177&width=632)

* **Thông tin về nút có thể được xem bằng lệnh:**

  ```
  massa_node_info
  ```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dusAC2dVDWsaRmx7ssU7v.png?height=324&width=692)

**=>>> Sao lưu dữ liệu**

Mỗi giai đoạn (tháng), sẽ cần khôi phục ví trong phiên bản mới của mạng, do đó, để tránh mất phần thưởng, bạn cần tạo một bản sao lưu của các tệp, lưu chúng vào PC của bạn  *(lệnh hiển thị đường dẫn tệp)*

```
echo $HOME/massa/massa-node/config/node_privkey.key
echo $HOME/massa/massa-client/wallet.dat
```

Nếu một tập lệnh được sử dụng để tự động cài đặt hoặc cập nhật, thì bản sao lưu của các tệp này sẽ nằm dọc theo đường dẫn:

```
echo $HOME/massa_backup/
```

**=>>> Mở cổng**

Nhóm nghiên cứu đã đề cập rằng sẽ có thêm phần thưởng khi mở cổng. Để làm điều này, bạn cần mở cổng 31244 và 31245 và cấu hình cấu hình.

* **Dừng node:**

```
sudo systemctl stop massad
```

* **Mở các cổng**

```
. <(wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SecorD0/utils/main/miscellaneous/ports_opening.sh) \
31244 31245
```

* **Kiểm tra xem các cổng có mở không**

```
ss -tulpn | grep :3303
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7LX7dY2cypYxCODhvGiY6.png?height=70&width=977)

* **Nếu lệnh trên không check được thì check lại như sau:**

```
apt install net-tools
```

```
netstat -atu
```

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oURHtNJFtiTuM-kt2KJ56.png?height=425&width=780)

* Ghi địa chỉ IP bên ngoài vào tệp cấu hình:

  > ```
  > sudo tee <<EOF >/dev/null $HOME/massa/massa-node/config/config.toml
  > [network]
  > routable_ip = "`wget -qO- eth0.me`"
  > EOF
  > ```
* Copy danh sách [IP ở đây](https://github.com/SecorD0/Massa/blob/main/bootstrap_list.txt) và paste vào cấu hình:

  Ctr + C để thoát cấu hình
* Nếu lệnh trên không thực hiện được thì sử dụng câu lệnh sau:

  ```
  vi massa/massa-node/base_config/config.toml
  ```

  Sau đó copy hết danh sách IP ở link trên paste vào, ấn Ctrl + C, sau đó ấn tiếp Ctrl + X để thoát
* Khởi động lại node:

  ```
  sudo systemctl restart massad
  ```
* Kiểm tra lại node:

  ```
  massa_log
  ```

**IV. Đăng kí NODE:**

1. **Tham gia vào máy chủ [discord](https://discord.gg/massa) dự án vào xác minh**
2. **Trên máy chủ discord dự án truy cập mục [#⌠✅⌡testnet-rewards-registration](https://discord.com/channels/828270821042159636/872395473493839913)**

   Tích vào icon bất kì sau đó bot sẽ gửi tin nhắn riêng tư
3. **Gửi IP máy chủ vào bot, IP máy chủ là IP của node, hoặc có thể check IP server bằng câu lệnh sau:**

   ```
   wget -qO- eth0.me
   ```
4. **Copy IP chat vào bot trên discord**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Fz87H2AznKPHutB42VOE-.png?height=853&width=1332)

**5.  Chạy lệnh trên máy chủ và nhập ID Discord do bot cấp:**

```
massa_cli_client -a node_testnet_rewards_program_ownership_proof
```

Nếu lệnh đăng ký bị lỗi  và không hiển thị bất cứ điều gì, thì bạn cần phải:

* Đăng xuất khỏi ứng dụng khách:

```
Exit
```

* Khởi động lại nút:

```
sudo systemctl restart massad
```

* Sau 10 giây, thực hiện lại lệnh đăng ký

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cmg_L3zT_QROmZ2NtVi4U.png?height=131&width=1561&&&&&size=medium)

* **Sau khi chạy lệnh copy dòng màu xanh trả về gửi vào bot discord:**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uU7aY35jCKOs89dWo8E_8.png?height=282&width=895)

CMC前100 赛道分布，搞公链项目占比40%，几乎大壁江山；其次是货币支付概念占比18%；稳定币占比10% ； 交易所代币占比8%； defi&gamefi 合计占比12%。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-5811f9d3d14983fada18b878ee44bdbf_b.jpg)

区块链技术发展10多年， 某一赛道的背后对应的是某一阶段的热点，留在CMC前100 的项目， 每个都有每个的故事，像过气的明星， 也像时代的弄潮儿。

**2017年前，拓荒时期：**

这一发展阶段大概发生在2017 年前，能炒作的概念并不多， 大部分项目的立项的初衷是对标BTC，从网络速度， 支付便捷，支付匿名性等方面进行创新， 硬分叉， 支付概念， 匿名币都是这时期的产物，共同特点是货币支付属性。那个时候项目出来做超越BTC的货币，现在还有几十上百亿美金市值，当下哪个项目要是出来做超越BTC的代币， 估计会被人笑死了。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-af33b86e7d6b60ce33b2595c002f3c4c_b.jpg)

**2017年-2020年，基础设施搭建时期 ：**

这一时期主要产物是公链百花齐放，中心化交易所百家争鸣，稳定币作为交易媒介也繁荣崛起。

公链项目在CMC 前100占比大概40% ，目前头部当然是ETH , 公链赛道下面又分什么分片技术， 跨链技术，EVM兼容等细分领域， 在此不一一展开。

这一时期，中心化交易也所迅速发展，甚至进入白热化，戏称交易所币比韭菜多， 这里姑且用平台代币市值衡量头部标准， 竞争格局如下：

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9bc01146e4745358f1ea7a60778cb6a4_b.jpg)

稳定币作为交易媒介， 同时用于评估虚拟资产与现实价值的媒介，其发行模式分别由机构背书， 代币价值锚定，算法稳定币 这三种。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5726e75f67737b374f66d23749cc63c0_b.jpg)

**2020-至今，生态应用展露头角时期**：

DEFI运用是公链生态繁荣的第一站，在区块链的是世界里， 人们更加追求去中心化，和资本运作效率，因此去中心化的交易所和借贷平台应运而生，迎来2020年defi summer。

Defi 赛道的去中心化交易和借贷平台分布：

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-6a2a5151393607ab8819c50aee743d5b_b.jpg)

除了defi， 另外一个生态应用爆发赛道便是gamefi :

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-d4e616d2351f758fd55584914b226493_b.jpg)

最后一个，其他细分领域头部占比12%。代币背后是某一技术创新，比如LINK , AR，ICP 这种。

四点感受 ：

1 .头部一直被模仿，很难被超越；

2\.新币逐劣币，有点创新的项目，在某一时间，成为市场热点的可能性比较大；

3\.2020年之后的项目，挺进CMC前100，挺多是dapp 应用和新晋公链；

4\.猜想未来的黑马，大概也应该要满足2&3两点

title: Layer2天王级项目zkSync交互教程，附上Zigzag交互，带你一次性撸两份空投！
body:
大家好，我是Jokia，一名计算机科学与技术硕士研究生，热衷于币圈交易、信息收集、空投分享。欢迎各位朋友关注我，一起学习交流进步！**各位朋友喜欢的话帮忙多转发多点赞，你们的支持是我持续更新的动力，我会一直给大家挑选优质项目！**

微信：1345595351（有不懂的问题可以来问我）

**欢迎大家关注我的推特，一起学习一起交流一起分享！**

[https://twitter.com/Tiffany71088502](https://twitter.com/Tiffany71088502)


---

## 交互背景：（写在前面的话）

这两天相信加密市场给了大部分人重重一击，我也不例外。俗话说新手死于追高，老手死于抄底。我大部分资金已经换成U了，但是前几天买了几成ETH和Ray目前是被埋了，目前ETH的价格也还算美丽，虽然未来有很大可能性会继续下跌，但我觉得现在买一点用来做交互是非常不错的。我们不能追求抄到一个绝对底部，只能慢慢定投找到市场的相对底部。zkSync去年大部分人就已经交互完了，今天主要是想做Zigzag的交互教程，顺带把zkSync也重新写一份，各位没有交互的朋友可以按着我的教程一步一步来做。我会尽量把教程写得更加详细，让每个朋友都能看懂，如果还是有不懂的，可以推特或者VX联系我，有空的时候我会给大家一一解答。


---

## 项目简介：

### 一：zkSync

1\.简介：Matter Labs 开发的 zkSync 作为基于 ZK Rollups 架构的扩容方案，已经上线主要聚焦于支付目的的 1.0 主网和完全兼容 EVM 的通用 2.0 测试网，在 zkSync 2.0 中，L2 状态分为具有链上数据可用性的 zkRollup 和具有链下数据可用性的 zkPorter，而且两者可组合和互操作。zkSync 还升级了其 2.0 门户，支持以任何代币支付网络费用，极大地提升了用户使用灵活性。

2\.融资情况：截止去年 11 月份 Matter Labs 从 a16z、Union Square Ventures、Placeholder 共融到 5800 万美元。

3\. zkSync生态：根据 zkSync 官网生态全景和此前公布的信息，zkSync 生态目前共有 70 多个项目，其中基础设施占据过半，包括 10 来个钱包、15 个桥或跨链解决方案、支付网关等，还有多家交易所也将支持 zkSync 存取。另外，已经或将要支持 zkSync 的 DeFi 类项目有 30 个。

### 二：Zigzag

1\.简介：Zigzag Exchange 是一个基于 ZK Rollup 的订单簿 DEX。就是 zkSync 上的 dYdX，有价格走势图、订单簿、买单、卖单、（头寸）创建和销毁的交易量、清算量，只需花一秒点击鼠标就能实现交易。

2\.融资情况：ZigZag 在去年 10 月份获得 10 万美元赠款，并在 zkSync 1.0 上启动初始交易对。


---

## 交互教程

1\.在中心化交易所购买ETH提现到自己的小狐狸钱包（你用的其他钱包也行嘛），建议买200-500刀之内的ETH吧。如果这一步有新手朋友不会的请来问我！

2\.打开下面zkSync网址，点击以太钱包。选择小狐狸，小狐狸记得是在以太链上哦，不是的话自己换过来。

[https://wallet.zksync.io/](https://wallet.zksync.io/)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ifQLVCZn5fxHMElh07HIU.png?height=1030&width=1757)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/txH3IaONSr5NpVaRZiv95.png?height=631&width=1237)

3\.把刚刚从交易所提现到L1的ETH转入到L2去，点击Top up，在下面的桥中选择zkSync，然后填好数量并且选择好代币，也不一定要ETH，如果你钱包里面有足够的ETH做GAS费，你充其他的币到L2也行！不过我建议新手还是统一用ETH！最后点击top up就行了！具体看截图！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PSjlgJpic2TQv9CzUxVC7.png?height=904&width=1414)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/X3tPCMyqE0ly7JqfBoH7w.png?height=1453&width=1177)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ARQQY85gJHC2-uDZDIc_A.png?height=933&width=1000)

4\.等待几分钟后，就可以在L2层看到自己刚刚充值的资产了。这样我们可以算是说完成了L2的入金操作。我去年刷取zkSync空投的时候也只是简单转入了几个以太坊，然后又转出去了，今年又做了一些其他的交互，丰富了下链上交易数据。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JtsGLP_66TGorPNJsd2lC.png?height=1047&width=1437)

5\.我们点击Swap去刷Zigzag交互，点击swap我们会发现我们已经跳转到了zigzag的页面了，我们点击右上角的连接钱包，将自己的钱包的连接上进行交易买卖！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ih9pcNROmkYyVTCarPdGV.png?height=883&width=1119)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6_5fguOkSGFsnAitfj2X4.png?height=1650&width=2712)

6\.选择交易对，买入与卖出。我们选择ETH/USDC交易对，其实都行，看你们自己，新手跟我我来就行。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EIpqDwGVDOcx9zDP72e5Q.png?height=604&width=649)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4IfJip_IeBco_pOOe_4-7.png?height=783&width=649)

7\.上图红框部分解释：

```
 1）买入与卖出：买就选择buy，卖就选择sell。

 2）买入或者卖出价格：买入价格根据市价下单就好了，卖出价格看你自己决定了。我们第一次肯定是选择卖出了，把ETH换成USDC。

3）买入或者卖出数量：根据你的账户数量而定。

4）交易手续费：买入卖出的手续费用。
```

8\.体验一下Zigzag的桥功能，可以在买入卖出交互完之后将ETH从L2转回L1，手续费很便宜，这里会在Jokia观点中再次提到！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MVJENNPult3laD593HU3J.png?height=871&width=1222)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jvo3YpvFL6JNak4ppJ_S5.png?height=1475&width=2572)


---

## Jokia观点：

zkSync和Zigzag是少数几个我认为一定要去做交互的项目。zkSync项目方明确了会有空投，Zigzag目前项目方好像还没有说，但我觉得95%的可能性也会发币，希望各位朋友目前的市场环境下原理二级交易市场，保护好自己的本金，花一点小费用来进行项目的交互博取一下空投的机会。最后给大家简单谈谈我自己对这两个项目的看法：

1\.本次交互教程中的任务，在Zigzag买入卖出我建议三次以上，并且分时买入卖出，让资金在里面躺上几天！我们第一次入金到L2的时候进行一次卖出，将ETH换成USDC；第二天再把USDC买回ETH；第三天又换成USDC，第四天又买回ETH。最后在Zigzag中通过桥把ETH从L2又转回L1，最后你可以提到交易所卖了换成U完成这次交互。

2\.多号做交互的时候一定记住不要相互转账！不要相互转账！不要相互转账！钱包入金一律从交易所提！

3\.OP已经发币了，我觉得zkSync也不远了，对比OP，我更看好zkSync，它在许多方面比OP有着更好的性能和优势。

4\.从KYC、法律等等各种层面来说我绝对看好去中心化交易所在未来的发展。未来去中心化交易所必然代替中心化交易所，这是趋势，只是过程很漫长。

5\.最后留下一个猜想，Zigzag官方似乎没有说是否发币，也可能说了我没注意到。但不管发不发币，我想请大家猜想一下：那些交易的手续费会不会以后作为分红用来分配给Zigzag支持者呢、参与者、建设者呢？如果会有那哪种形式最可能呢？

title: 详解 PoS 经济格局：质押会推动下一轮牛市吗？
body:
**我们需要一个更好的代币经济学设计来支持质押协议，一个特定的数据分析工具也是必要的。**

## 内容要点

1. 我们把 PoS 质押分成了三部分：节点供应商、液态质押池、金融衍生品
2. 大玩家已经主导了整个质押市场
3. 新玩家可以通过支持长尾资产，以及更好的用户体验进入市场
4. 质押市场仍有以下机会：

* 数据分析工具
* 用于启动节点供应商业务的工具包
* 长期固定利率的定投衍生品
* 更好的代币经济学设计

## 引言

为了获得更高的每秒钟交易量（TPS）和效率，以太坊正在从工作量证明（PoW）过渡到权益证明（PoS）。大多数支持智能合约的主要区块链都使用了权益证明，如 Solana、Cardano 和 Avalanche。

![资料来源：2021 年质押生态系统报告](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qs1EZKY2rmCqZC-qUfBpc.png?height=866&width=1394)

大多数区块链都转向了权益证明，因为与工作量证明方法相比，权益证明使它们能够接受高性能、更快的结算速度、环境可持续性、可扩展性、较低的安全成本以及灵活的架构。

![来源：2021 年质押生态系统报告](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/btW_rFd4Q8L2bSExFE9_T.png?height=866&width=1394)

权益证明为用户提供了一种获得稳定收益的新方式。它将原生资产委托给质押节点，这样进行质押的用户就可以获得平均 10%\~20% 的年化收益率。这种方式就像国家的国债一样，它是稳定的，低风险的，它比流行的 DEX（去中心化交易所）和借贷平台上的稳定币挖矿更有利可图。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/H3IGUSSPK5hKaeDaTdYOE.png?height=812&width=1394)

希望这些加密货币国债可以帮助投资者克服法币通货膨胀。下面的图表说明了世界各地的通货膨胀率。法定货币的通货膨胀率约为 3% 到 6%。

![资料来源：2021 年质押生态系统报告](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_EdXdoqAT3tVTGnKRdaBg.png?height=812&width=1394)

## 质押的机制

不同的区块链有不同的质押机制，这些机制在提现期和罚没（slashing）规则上有所不同。

## 以太坊

为了实现可持续性和可扩展性，以太坊正在从工作量证明转向权益证明。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DGp75wEoQHohW_flP74m4.png?height=1052&width=1394)

以太坊将质押的定义描述如下：「质押是指充值 32 个 ETH 来激活验证器软件的行为。作为验证者，你将负责存储数据，处理交易，并向区块链添加新的区块。这将为每个人保持以太坊的安全，并在这个过程中为你赢得新的 ETH。这个过程被称为权益证明，由信标链引入。」

简而言之，为了成为质押者，用户需要质押 32 个 ETH 并运行一个验证器节点。用户至少要在以太坊区块链合并后才能提走自己质押的 ETH。

目前，在不扣除服务器成本的前提下，在以太坊上进行质押的用户将获得约 4.2% 的年利率。Kraken 在《2022 年第一季度质押状况》的报告中预计，在以太坊主网合并后，质押用户的年利率将增加到 8.5%-11.5%。

![来源：2022 年第一季度的质押状况](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FlHdAZAwHDJomh5lhu2-3.png?height=542&width=1394)

运行以太坊节点不需要什么高端的硬件，节点服务器的成本相对较低。推荐的规格是：

* 超过 4 核的 CPU
* 16 GB 以上的内存
* 至少有 500 GB 自由空间的 SSD
* 超过 25 MBit/s 带宽

基于节点类型，磁盘空间的要求从 400 GB 到 6 TB 不等。

在 ETH2 网络中，一个提议者（proposer）挖出新的区块，证明者（attester）通过投票赞成这个区块是否成为区块链的一部分。

罚没意味着验证者违反了规则，被迫退出。有三种罚没条件：

* 作为提议者，该节点为一个区块签署了一个以上的信标区块
* 作为证明者，节点在同一目标上签署了一个以上的证明
* 作为证明者，节点签署了与历史冲突的证明

如果这些行为中的任何一个被发现，那么该节点将在未来 36 天左右被迫退出信标链。惩罚将在 36 天左右继续发生，直到节点可以退出。惩罚数量将根据网络状况而发生变化。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cnT9LaEdhF5Mw_DlaimfA.png?height=936&width=1394)

罚没迫使验证者退出网络，但惩罚不会。用户受到惩罚的条件可以归为以下几类：

* 验证者惩罚
* 不活跃的泄漏惩罚

当前，以太坊网络总共有 13310531 个 ETH 被质押，总共有 39.6982 万个验证者。下面的图表说明了 ETH2.0 的质押率和质押的 ETH。

![资料来源：CryptoQuant](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wxkeit-Q09-N7eK4hQGeO.png?height=872&width=1394)

![资料来源：CryptoQuant](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aBJfc5XipnamxEJd-neDM.png?height=872&width=1394)

质押流入图显示了一些流入的高峰时间点。一些大的流入发生在 2020 年 12 月和 2022 年 3 月。

![资料来源：CryptoQuant](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s2jHCHaEF5of7cbaOjQH8.png?height=854&width=1394)

Kraken 是 ETH2.0 的第一个参与者。中心化交易所是在质押市场上仍有优势。它们可以把它们的现有用户变成 ETH 2.0 的购买者。

![资料来源：以太坊 2.0 信标链（第 0 阶段）区块链浏览器 —— 质押池服务概述](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F295ty5ZGa4wJXCCzkA14.png?height=724&width=1394)

对于液态质押来说，Lido 在市场上占主导地位。液态质押衍生品帮助用户将其质押资产变现，从而提高资本效率。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hTxGQdFbdU70BtmMrJKMJ.png?height=744&width=1394)

## 竞争链

很多支持智能合约的区块链因考虑到 TPS 和可持续性而使用权益证明。

它们有不同的规则。一些区块链允许用户将他们的质押委托给活跃的验证者。这些验证者运行节点，并从委托抵押中收取佣金费用。用户要想撤回他们的质押就需要等待一段时间才能取消委托。

目前，以太坊 2.0 的质押率是最低的。

![资料来源：Staking Rewards](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s5VYopTb_c5Z30T96SUjR.png?height=1004&width=1394)

## 节点供应商

运行自己的质押节点将会面临很多风险，并且需要大量的资金来启动。个人很难维持一个 24/7 的在线服务器，并且不做错事造成惩罚。为了帮助个人更容易地进行质押和赚取奖励，市场上出现了质押即服务。节点供应商将负责管理基础设施，用户只需要把他们的资金在节点供应商提供的平台上进行质押即可。

节点供应商提供节点操作服务。他们向个人和液态质押衍生品提供服务。对个人而言，节点提供商每月收取节点操作费或佣金费。而对流动质押衍生品而言，节点提供者通常会得到质押奖励的一个百分比。Lido 解释了他们如何选择节点运营商‌。

市场上有很多节点提供商，它们在以下方面有所不同：

* 费用
* 支持的资产
* 可靠性和安全性

![来源：Staking Rewards](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i9-F-T4Xu6t81TntPALYj.png?height=1004&width=1394)

一些大玩家已经建立了庞大的用户群，良好的声誉，以及安全的运营记录。在这种情况下，新玩家很难占据大量的市场份额。大的市场参与者认为小的参与者的机会有以下几点：

* 更好的用户体验
* 支持长尾资产
* 提供除质押以外的服务，如生态系统更新、简单的金融工程师工具、信息网站和数据分析工具

尽管小玩家很难与大玩家竞争，但是与此同时，大玩家确实也面临着一些挑战：

* 中心化风险
* 合规性
* 安全和运营风险

去中心化是一个网络的关键。@djrtwo 在他的文章《液态质押衍生品的风险》‌中对此提出质疑。如果几个节点供应商在网络中拥有主要利益，那么这些节点供应商就是联合垄断的一个阶层。

要建立一个去中心化和无许可的产品，合规是一个大问题。Stake.fish 在《2021 年质押生态系统报告》‌中认为，「由于质押在某种意义上看起来像固定收益，这可能会招致监管者认为验证者比矿工更接近于金融实体。如果发生这种情况，那么验证者将没有办法保持合规，而不成为一个完全许可的托管人并守护委托人的访问权（这在技术上可能又是不可能执行的）。」

节点运营商把安全放在第一位，因为安全事故会造成资产损失。2021 年 1 月，ETH2 验证者由于一个错误而被罚没。以下是 ETH2 验证器的近期遭受罚没的历史。

![资料来源：beaconcha.in](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Jtv8OUB7KC-3NGpoIa3a8.png?height=490&width=1394)

节点供应商正试图通过秘密共享验证器（SSV）等新技术来提高基础设施的稳定性。秘密共享验证器网络是一种可以达到主动冗余的技术。网络中的所有验证者都会主动产生新的区块。该机制就像一个多签名的钱包。

![资料来源：OBOL](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WT3Nc60P74k5BPBPeSzpX.png?height=798&width=1394)

其他用于防止罚没的技术是本地罚没保护数据库，它记录了导致罚没的信息，以及记录了所有收到的证明和区块的远程罚没器。

从 Staking Rewards 的调查‌来看，用户确实更关心的是 节点供应商的信誉而不是成本，而节点供应商正在努力提高它们的可靠性，从而更好的建立它们的声誉。

![来源：Staking Rewards](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kgv6-75MCKpJHS0b6kbPl.png?height=810&width=1394)

## 液态质押池

用户在选择了最佳的质押节点供应商后，他们所面临的下一个问题就是如何提高资本效率。用户需要将资产锁定在质押节点中，但每年只能获得 10% 的收益。在加密货币世界里，到处都有机会。将资产锁定在质押池中的机会成本是巨大的。因此，用户正在努力提高资本效率。液态押池可以帮助用户几乎即时的获得流动资金。

液态质押池有两个功能：

1. 降低用户的质押要求
2. 大大增加被质押资产的流动性

为了增加被质押资产的流动性，液态质押池为用户铸造新的代币。例如，在 Lido 抵押 ETH 后，Lido 为用户铸造 stETH。用户可以在去中心化交易所上用 ETH 交换 stETH。以下是 stETH 的定价图。

![资料来源：Dex Screener](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GhjH1Bikoa2BROEsEgwu8.png?height=790&width=1394)

stETH 就像一个债券。1 个 stETH 可以在不可预知的未来赎回 1 个 ETH。我们不确定以太坊何时会在质押节点发布已质押资产，因为发布已质押资产需要在 ETH2.0 合并后进行硬分叉来更新。

接下来的几个图表显示，Lido 主导了 ETH 的质押市场，并确保了很大一部分市场份额。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZUkmnG1FY3jDX9eqSPE48.png?height=730&width=1394)

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qoKgOfGtf5Libb5-Fo6YE.png?height=728&width=1394)

然而，Marinade 代替 Lido 主导了 Solana 的液态质押市场。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1eW8OL90BmgddNofXs6Rm.png?height=730&width=1394)

以下是 Solana 的液态质押的费用明细。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-2JYNp8Wcug9ORRqreavo.png?height=738&width=1394)

除了费用和声誉，效用是另一个要点。更多的合作关系意味着在去中心化交易所和借贷平台的流动资产的流动性更深。Marinade 与 DeFi 项目的合作关系最多。

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6b-kXo5doKod8i3CUTHtw.png?height=736&width=1394)

![资料来源：Delphi Digital](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_NA0FaKHHAQyOiicF7KEA.png?height=738&width=1394)

## 金融

大多数 DeFi 的用户都非常关注协议的年化收益率。那有没有什么方法可以推动我们的质押收益率，但仍然享受较低的风险呢？答案是有的。杠杆挖矿（leverage farming）可以做到这一点。

大多数杠杆收益农场使用 2\~3 倍的杠杆，并提供大约 7% 的年化收益率。当然，它们也确实面临着清算的风险。

这一过程的基本操作是，他们在 Aave 上存入 stETH，通过 Aave 借入 WETH。然后他们用 WETH 换取更多的 StETH 并重复上述步骤。

另一个有趣的项目是 Staking Rewards 的 SR20‌。SR20 是一个包含前 20 个 PoS 资产的指数，按总质押价值加权。该指数也在持续累积质押奖励。下面的图表展示了该指数中加密货币的分配情况。

![来源：Staking Rewards](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9R7ZsXJkpokkDfFv2POXL.png?height=1266&width=1394)

目前的指数价格是 304.41 美元，奖励率是 6.54%。质押回报率 YOY 为 9.44%。下面是 SR20 的价格图。

![资料来源：Staking Rewards](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0K1kauI8YT2EFB-1SMgFI.png?height=1168&width=1394)

为了避免罚没风险，也有针对验证者的保险产品。Lido 与 Unslashed Finance 合作，在 2021 年 2 月为价值约 2 亿美元的以太坊质押提供保险，以避免被罚没。

![来源：Lido Medium](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nCLhbNSPu5rLsgnVcTQpl.png?height=778&width=1394)

## 质押市场接下来将如何发展

当前，质押的生态系统已经逐步建立。大玩家已经在市场上获得了强大的地位。总的质押市场将继续增长，因为与其他 PoS 资产相比，ETH 的质押比例仍然很低。我们对质押市场的未来持乐观态度。

质押资产类似于购买国债。机构和大鲸鱼都愿意购买这些资产。但是国债和质押之间的一个很大的区别是，质押的回报是不固定的。质押的奖励会根据网络条件而变化。为了使年化收益率更加稳定，我们预计会有固定的年化收益率和长期质押资产的出现。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2ZTKARL5jjyFVgJSsHAWl.png?height=734&width=1394)

目前液态质押协议的代币经济学无法捕捉到真正的价值。随着收入和总锁仓量的上升，这些液态质押协议的代币价格逐渐下降。我们需要一个更好的代币经济学设计来支持质押协议。目前，质押协议的收入不与代币持有人分享，这使得代币成为一个纯粹的治理代币。

新玩家的两个机会是更好的用户体验和长尾资产支持。在官方文件的帮助下，设置一个节点是很容易的，而真正困难的部分是运营和客户管理。为了更好地支持这些新玩家，提供一些工具包是必要的，这与 VPN 市场类似。晚一步进入市场的小玩家可以提供更低的费用，以及更好的用户体验。

一个特定的数据分析工具也是必要的。对于质押者来说，他们关心的是活跃度历史，质押比例历史，罚没历史等。这些数据与我们使用的普通数据集不同。我们使用的普通数据集通常关注的是交易。为了更好地支持投机者，市场需要一个新的数据分析工具。
